name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in building high-performance web applications with a strong focus on **React**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**. Highly proficient in translating design requirements into functional user interfaces, leveraging **Figma** for UI/UX design collaboration. Demonstrates a deep understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and Agile methodologies to drive project success and ensure timely delivery. 

In addition to frontend expertise, I have a robust background in full-stack development, utilizing **Next.js** and **Vue** alongside backend technologies such as **Node.js** and **Django**. My extensive cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS** enhances application scalability and security compliance. I have successfully led the implementation of enterprise platforms with compliance to standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring robust security protocols. Passionate about continuous learning and application refinement, I thrive in dynamic environments where innovation meets efficiency.
